subTitle: User Access
title: Registered Users
desc: We provide secure access for registered university staff and students, ensuring data privacy and confidentiality. Our system offers role-based permissions to control access and maintain the integrity of exam scheduling information.

subTitle: Efficiency
title: Optimized Resource Management
desc: Our system optimizes resource a location by efficiently assigning exam venues, invigilators, and time slots. Through inte ligent resource management, we minimize conflicts and maximize the utilization of available resources.
